GSD.description:
scsi: libfc: Fix array index out of bound exception

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.135 by commit 0fe70c15f9435bb3c50954778245d62ee38b0e03. For more details please see the references link.
